properties.name: notify.me.scheduled.email.cron
properties.description: Cron expression that determines when the collected emails should be send.  Default '0 12 * * * 0', every wednesday at midday.

properties.name: notify.me.twilio.fromNumber
properties.description: The twilio number to use to send text messages to users.

properties.name: notify.me.twilio.whatsAppFromNumber
properties.description: The twilio number to use to send whatsapp messages to users.

properties.name: notify.me.sandbox
properties.description: Whether or not to run the application in sandbox mode (no actual emails will be send in sandbox mode).
